website_summaries.verdict: Definitely the best on the market. We recommend investing in this product whose durability and expert design pays off over time.
pros: Stands out from the rest for its contoured design, which is easier on the forearms
cons: Higher price tag, but well worth the investment

customer_reviews.title: The grip is very comfortable, although the handle could be just a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: The contour fit of this kettlebell is by far the most ergonomic and is worth paying extra for, I can assure you. When you are in any 'racked' position during your exercise routine, the contoured ball fits snugly against your forearm and causes no discomfort at all, unlike other round kettlebells. The grip is very comfortable, although the handle could be just a bit wider for those with bigger hands, but that's not a huge issue in my opinion. Overall I believe this is the best ergonomic fit in the market right now.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel, but vinyl covering split after light use.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the GoFit 20# kettlebell until the vinyl split after 3 months of use. I can still use it, but it makes me sad. 9/22/19 I reached out to GoFit about my dissatisfaction with cracked vinyl on my kettlebell and received no response. I do not recommend this product due to lack of concern for customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: No batteries needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great! I am 66 YOA male and found something that can work my whole body. No treadmill pounding, walking in the rain, no batteries, no electricity. Start with the 7 lb. and work your way up in weight. This way you won't get frustrated with your progress. I ordered the 10 and 15 lb bells to be a constant reminder that I must move up in weight. Exercise Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday, be patient and you will feel and see the difference. Watch the video several times, learn the different exercises, then practice each before you start the full routine. Can you tell that i am happy with my Kettlebell and myself because I am sticking with it. Pat
customer_reviews.author: Pat Coyle

customer_reviews.title: The shape does enhance my workout.
customer_reviews.text: Shape makes working out so much safer - and much less stress on my wrists/forearms. I'm so glad I got this - after using it I gave away the traditional kettle bell I had been using, as that one was easy to bang into my wrists. I have fairly large hands, and I find the handle on this to be a good size - not too big, but both hands can hold for swings without being cramped or overlapping. The vinyl on it is a nice feature as well. As I gain strength, I'll be getting the next size up of this kettle bell.
customer_reviews.author: pe-00

customer_reviews.title: Contoured edges hurt the forearm.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping the contoured shape would make my punching training (lying on back, punching straight forward) or kettle bell chest presses more ergonomical. But actually made the experience much worse than with a regular kettle bell, as the contoured edges are too sharp and really dig into the forearms. The design would be so much better if the edges were more rounded. Give it 2 stars for the good idea and the quality seems good, but to me they do not offer the ergonomics I was looking for and I will be returning the two that I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego P

customer_reviews.title: GoFit 10Lb Vinyl Coated Kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice kettlebells. Two were purchased as additions to heavier GoFit kettlebells that I already own. The finish and vinyl coating are high quality and the contoured shape is more ergonomic than round kettlebells for many of the exercises I do, especially when the kettlebell contacts the back of the arm. The included DVD is professionally done and very helpful with how to properly use kettlebells. It also demonstrates various exercises. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: D&D Texans

customer_reviews.title: The Superior Kettlebell!
customer_reviews.text: The contoured kettlebells are in my opinion, the greatest exercise equipment ever invented,,,they are unmatched in versatility,,they can be used of course like regular bells,,,but are superior to dumbbells when used in the same way,,you are able to keep the center of gravity on a perfectly vertical basis,,,which makes for a much more intense muscular stimulation. I have two of each,,from 7# to 45#,,and for me these and an adjustable flat bench give me a complete gym.
customer_reviews.author: Dany Faige

customer_reviews.title: Does not sit flat
customer_reviews.text: Works fine as a kettlebell but forget trying to use it to elevate for pushups, it will wobble and not stay steady. Regret buying, would have rather had a competition style kettlebell.
customer_reviews.author: Grahaminator

customer_reviews.title: Obviously, it will feel a bit more "clunky" than ...
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, it will feel a bit more "clunky" than a round kettlebell. Is easier on the forearms, EXCEPT for the "straight punch" motion. Slimmer, weight distribution feels more uneven during motion in most exercises. I would probably go with a completely, even though bigger round kettlebell, but still no qualms in purchasing. The handle is more grittier than most kettlebells. That's a personal choice for you to decide if you want that or not.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: I think they are well made and the contoured body is perfect as it fits around the forearm area without banging ...
customer_reviews.text: I have many go fit kettlebells..........I think they are well made and the contoured body is perfect as it fits around the forearm area without banging into your arm.
customer_reviews.author: ralphie

customer_reviews.title: How can you go wrong with a kettlebell?
customer_reviews.text: Kettlebells are something you either love or hate. I love them but the ones at the gym bruise my forearms. Bruised forearms are 'unprofessional'. The contoured kettlebells do not bang my forearms and they do not bruise me. This means more workouts and more strength. It's a win win. Some workouts call for two kettlebells. I use two 15lb ones for those. For one kettlebell workouts, I use the 20lb
customer_reviews.author: Plain Jane

customer_reviews.title: Shape helps save your wrist !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this the most easy and effective way for me to get a strength building work out plus cardio. I love how its shaped so that different moves that normally smack the wrist are way more comfortable. Thank you for a great product
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kettlebell!
customer_reviews.text: I like this kettleball very much. The contour is easier on my wrist. The handle is smooth and swings easily. I like the rubber coating as well. My only complaint is that even my tiny hands cannot both grasp the handle at the same time for two handed swings. The video is good, I like the workout presented. I have taken one star for the one handed handle which will limit the use of this style of kettlebell.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R.

customer_reviews.title: Came with rubber coating ripped, but otherwise a great kettlebell!
customer_reviews.text: I like the kettle bell just fine, love the contour that curves around your arm instead of just banging into it. Was not happy that the rubber coating was ripped when I received it. I just swing it so it does not affect the use of the bell in any way, just disappointed and with it being 15lbs I just didn't want to bother shipping it back, the smaller ones I bought were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MidWestMom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was a bit skeptical that I would ever use this when I bought it, however, I have proven him wrong. I love my Kettlebell! At 10 pounds it is just enough weight to get a great workout and the contour of the bell makes doing routines easy. It came promptly and was just as advertised. It also comes with an informative dvd that shows you proper usage of the kettlebell and has 3 workouts that will get your heart pumping.
customer_reviews.author: melissa michael

customer_reviews.title: GoFit Contoured kettlebell is a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the contour of this kettlebell. It makes my workout go smoothly and keeps my wrist from getting banged up while doing a few of the movements. The video that comes with the KBell is kinda hard, takes a few sessions to get through it without stopping a lot. If you have lower back problems, I would've recommend the video for you (they go really fast with the squats). All in all a great buy for the money as this is much higher in dept stores.
customer_reviews.author: Eve M

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap for a kettle bell. And the contoured shape does work great for resting on your forearm. Seems to be pretty durable. I use it in almost all of my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Lurkins

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This kettlebell did the job but I did not buy the same style when I increased my weight. The plastic coating cracked after a few uses and I found the contouring did not make the difference that I thought it would. It laid flat for some exercises but I was getting jabbed by the "curves" for others. It was nice they had a DVD with a decent workout to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Great for carpel tunnel.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before taking the plunge and purchasing these kettlebells. As someone who really wanted the cardio/strength training combination that kettlebells offer, but also having carpal tunnel, these were the perfect solution. Yes, they are considerably more expensive than many on the market, but the quality is above average and the shape prevents the bell from banging into your wrist during use. Overall, I'm extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CKayy

customer_reviews.title: Concave Design Easier on Your Wrists and Forearms
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent kettle-bells and the concave design beats the living crud out of bashing and smashing your veins against your wrist and forearm bones, especially with the heavier weights - but even the lighter weights are downright annoying with the conventional convex kettle-bell construct, which I can never figure out why this concave design isn't the standard versus the other "canon ball" design...
customer_reviews.author: xlander

customer_reviews.title: a part of my workout
customer_reviews.text: I lift so this works out just right for me. use it with my other weights.
customer_reviews.author: C. Luis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money and hassle
customer_reviews.text: New to kettlebells, but can still tell this is a crappy product. The handle has sharp bumps on both sides, the weight feels distributed oddly (heavier on one side). Plus there is cardboard firmly adhered to the top of the handle that I can't get to come off. The shipping was not good either (arrived several days late), and now I have to take it and ship it myself. They'll only reimburse you for $13.49 of shipping costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ergonomics
customer_reviews.text: The contour in this product is what makes it great. I don't know if the DVD is any good, I don't need whatever his name telling me how to use kettlebells, but that is not why I bought this. The countor takes undue strain off your wrist that may happen with more traditional kettlebell designs. The vinyl coating is nice and thick to help protect your floors and the units are compact because they are made of cast iron and not the cheap kind that are plastic and filled with sand or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight
customer_reviews.text: Works for me. Was a little expensive, but the gym is closed due to Covid and I needed something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for the money
customer_reviews.text: Looks good for the concept. Well made. To rack and press this kettle bell is different from traditional ball kettlebell. For home use and useing angle contoured kettlebells... It's 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated Kettlebell  A+
customer_reviews.text: It's simple: They refined the shape (excellent idea, it won't bruise your forearms) and this is why it's my favorite Kettlebell. It's also color coded for weight and the bare metal handle is Smooth (no jagged metal tags to cut your gloves or hands) which is expected at this price point. After 3 weeks I see the difference in my core, chest, shoulders and arms. Perfect to mix up my routine. Smart Kettlebell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was much tougher than expected but that is good.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as expected. Except for the workout DVD. It was much tougher than expected but that is good.
customer_reviews.author: Troy M Adams

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this kettlebell for a couple of weeks at my bootcamp class and like it very much so far. The shape makes one-handed pressing much more comfortable. Only complaint is that the handle becomes very slippery and hard to grip when your hand is sweating (makes certain motions pretty difficult). I haven't had this problem before with other kettlebells. I'm buying some grip tape to wrap around the handle; hopefully that will solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Nice small compact kettlebell. I like the color and it doubles as a doorstop in my small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Hard core workout
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try something different from my usual exercises, so I thought to try kettlebell. I'm glad I got the 10 pound, for a beginner that's the right amount of weight. I loved the routine and I sure did sweat. The contour of the kettlebell is nice. I haven't hurt myself yet. You sure do have to do this excercise right otherwise you will hurt your back. I'm planning on getting the 15 pound now that I got used to the 10.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Moles

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, but ruin for poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I did love this contur type kettlebell and found grip coating come off at first grab. It’s a hundred dollars product. Hard to recommend, be aware of this issue, if you are going to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Flynn

customer_reviews.title: the contour is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the $$, the contour is very nice and makes over the head manouvers very comfotable. Love the Vinyl coating, keeps them from clanging agains the floor. I purchased the 10 and 15-pound Kettlebells and will be purchasing more of this style when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: SkatejorerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for workouts!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for Kettle bells and have used many different kinds. I LOVE the vinyl coating on it. It makes it so much easier to handle for different exercises. I also love the handle. Its not completely smooth, but not beveled where it gives you blisters when used. Very comfortable grip for easy control.
customer_reviews.author: Cambria

customer_reviews.title: Thumb up product! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it last week. It arrived faster than scheduled. The shipping packaging was well conceived and not shifting around in the box at all. The product is well designed, well balanced, and stable. I can use it for all of kettleball exercises. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hensi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent instructions on dvd.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this rating because the instructions on the dvd are outstanding. Form is emphasized, instructions are very clear and easy to follow. Brook Benton makes the worker fun to do. I have only been using this for one week, but I have already lost several pounds. My thigh muscles no longer ache after a workout, indicating to me that I have already gained strength in my legs. I would recommend this to anyone starting out with kettle bells. Brook has a very light-hearted fun approach to the exercises, but she gives you a very serious workout.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have a previous set of Kettlebells that were very large and bulky making them awkward. These are very nice because they are contoured - when I'm holding them or flipping them around my wrist they feel great - molding to the shape of my wrist instead of hitting it. I love working out with these - highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Autism Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great engineering! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The contoured design allows you to hold and move them around your body without banging into your arms or wrists. If you've ever used plain old steel balls with handles on them, you know how painful it can be to have the weight impinge on your skin, bone and muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper from NY

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable style
customer_reviews.text: I like this 15lb. weight because of the shape and coating on the exterior. The contour shape rests on my arm well which adds stability for my wrists. I like the weight because I'm a beginner and I think in the long run I will be able to use it for awhile before I need to move to a 20lb. I recommend this style with whatever weight you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B.

customer_reviews.title: The contour shape is great for racking
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the product, but don't get excited about the included DVD. It was a 10 minute workout, but it was also an intense 10 minutes! The contour shape is great for racking. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle V

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet because it's too heavy. I know that sounds hilarious but people don't realize just how heavy 10 lbs is until they start swinging it around. So I'm working my way up to it by using 5 lb dumbells. I'm sure it will be the perfect thing when I am ready to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Strong

customer_reviews.title: Great form
customer_reviews.text: Great kettle bell. I have not viewed the DVD as I already have a number of exercises that I do with kettle bells. I use the 20 lb bell and my wife has the 10, we both love the compact form and contour for overhead presses/thrusters, etc. The handle is grippy but smooth enough for changing grip mid exercise without irritating your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best, as they are comfortable to use. Thanks, and sorry to be so long in replying.
customer_reviews.author: heber e crawford

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Yay I'm so happy with this kettlebell. I have a 10-lb one, but needed a little more weight. This style of kettlebell fits the bill. I love the design; I can work out without bruising my wrists. I'm working on acquiring a whole set. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: LisaJ

customer_reviews.title: Love the DVD that comes with it too!
customer_reviews.text: Get option for at home cardio/weights. The 30 min Bob Harper DVD that comes with it is a real workout. I bought a 10lbs weight because I didn't want to have to buy 5, then 10, then 15, etc. I am really pushing myself with it and afterwards it feels great. You will sweat to this one if you give 110%. I suggest wearing weight lifting gloves if you have soft/sensitive hands, the metal handle isn't the nicest thing on your skin. Great purchase, glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged handle
customer_reviews.text: Ordered twice and both times the handles had glue all over them.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Such a versatile piece of equipment and the contour shape is smart and makes it easier and safer to workout. These are for men or women and you need a few various wghts to attain a thorough workout but many options and a DVD comes with it which is great to give you tips on proper form and routines.
customer_reviews.author: skf1965

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my husband needed for his exercises for his shoulder
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: no more dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: I like these kettle bells. Keep a towel with you when you work out to make sure your hands are dry, as it can slip. I recommend for beginners trying the Love your body series on you tube. the kettlebell fit workout is a great teaching tool and its free.
customer_reviews.author: Jillinois

customer_reviews.title: True--they dont bang your forearms! Quality control may be an issue...
customer_reviews.text: I've got two. One for me--one for my wife. They REALLY do make a difference for those kettle bell moves that could potentially bang your forearms. For that reason (if non other) I would pick these up. Glad I purchased these. One of the bells will not stand up straight however. It leans a little bit. The plastic coating is non evenly sealed on the bottom. The 2nd bell I purchased is perfect. They need to improve their quality control. I would have given this 5 stars--except for the vinyl coating issue. That said, if I were to buy another kettle bell, it would be these.
customer_reviews.author: Ender

customer_reviews.title: For the girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be great quality. The shape is actually very smart. A regular kettle bell is pretty bad about banging into wrists and this curve helps especially for the female athlete.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton and Paige

customer_reviews.title: Love the coating and the handle
customer_reviews.text: Love the coating and the handle, but the shape makes it difficult to work with. It is very bulky. I think a round kettle bell works better.
customer_reviews.author: lola221

customer_reviews.title: Cracked coating.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, plastic coating cracked on two out of three received. Canceled delivery on other 12 not yet delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these kettlebells. The contour really helps to avoid injury especially on the heavier bells. Kettlebells are definitely my favorite, most effective work out companions.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Monterrosa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The contoured shape makes this kettlebell much more versatile, comfortable and easy to maneuver. The DVD is a great beginner's work out which was what I wanted after being far to sedentary. The combination of cardio and weights is great, the workout is fun and goes by really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, excellent!
customer_reviews.text: love moves where you hold the kettlebell in the air and the contour keeps the bell weight distributed evenly around the wrist--- instead of one concentrated circle of pressure. I will be trading in my others for these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable kettlebell, DVD not thrilled about
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a comfortable kettlebell. Not too excited about the DVD. Still looking into others that I believe will be better suited for me. However, my purchase was 95% for the kettlebell, and it definitely has met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this. easy to use and takes up less space.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in the mail. The weight is very good and the handle is easy to grip. It looks like the paint is fading/chipping off a little but that doesn't really have anything to do with the actual use of it. It's good, i recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Fastpitch Power

customer_reviews.title: Not Bob Harper DVD
customer_reviews.text: The kettlebell itself is great, love the contour. I only gave it 4 stars because the included DVD was not Bob Harper, it was Brook Benten.. The DVD is horrible. She has you doing squats for 20 minutes straight. Very difficult to do for a beginner. There are many other kettlebell moves that she could incorporate into the workout that are not so squat intensive. Luckily, I bought the Jillian Michaels Shred It With Weights DVD as well and this one has a better variety of moves.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Vicens

customer_reviews.title: Ms Fit & GoFit
customer_reviews.text: My personal trainer loves that I discovered these kettle bells. They're perfectly conformed to your body and it causes less stress while working out. When I'm ready to move up, GoFit will be my go to for kettle bells!
customer_reviews.author: Iryse

customer_reviews.title: Kettlebells-Love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: I think these are one of the best workout tools I have ever used! Aerobics and weights in one; smart! This design does make sense and I haven't quit using them, so these's a clue right there as to their value...
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I looking for....
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color, especially loved the size. In other brands, the 15lb is too big and it makes difficult to maneuver during workouts. The contoured shape is really appealing.
customer_reviews.author: S Rue

customer_reviews.title: Kettlebell is great, DVD not so much
customer_reviews.text: This was my first kettlebell and it seems like a well constructed one. I like the design and the vinyl coating. I can recommended the kettlebell and would buy one again. The DVD is a good start for a beginner like myself, but it isn't really a workout you'll want to do over and over. Bob Harper takes time to explain each move, and once you've seen the video once you don't really need all that instruction. I believe the purpose of the DVD was just to show you proper form, but you are still left having to devise your own workout routine. The DVD also doesn't show you that many movements, it mainly focuses on the swing.
customer_reviews.author: P. Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Love the kettlebell -- hated the workout dvd
customer_reviews.text: Love the kettlebell -- hated the workout dvd. The contour kettlebell is the way to go. I also like the bright yellow so I don't trip over it when I have it laying out. The dvd was annoying, maybe it was the instructor or that it was really hard to even do a few minutes. Either way I got some helpful hints and will be doing my own routines.
customer_reviews.author: K. T.

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the contouring on it so that it goes smooth on your forearm when you are doing certain exercises. The rubber coating is always nice when it comes to a weight as well.
customer_reviews.author: abarton

customer_reviews.title: Damaged :(
customer_reviews.text: Yellow part came cracked and split. :( Was pretty disappointed. However, I am sending it back for an exchange and hopeful the next one arrives in better shape.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Brown

customer_reviews.title: Contour Better for Push Ups and DVD Saves Your Back
customer_reviews.text: I was doing push up/rows with my noncontoured kettlebells and I fell and almost broke my arm. The contoured version is stable on the floor, which is what you need for push ups. Also, the DVD emphasizes the form for kettlebell swings and deadlifts, teaching you to put the weight on your heels, keep your back up, and use your hips, not your back, for elevating. There is even a warmup wall squat without any kettlebell weight to drill the proper form. After hurting my back 3 times because I wasn't paying attention to the correct technique, I now use strict form and haven't hurt my back since. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. JEFFREY MCMAHON

customer_reviews.title: CTX
customer_reviews.text: Love this Kettlebell and the Bob Harper DVD that came with it. Bob walks you through each position and is an awesome trainer...even on DVD. Would definitely recommend. I am a beginner and the 15 lbs is a perfect weight for me.
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: great weight, questionable value
customer_reviews.text: Well built, nicely coated, and works well. Perhaps overpriced for what it is, but it does the job more comfortably than a traditional round kettle bell.
customer_reviews.author: M. Henry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE contured kettlebell!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these contoured kettlebells! Item arrived as described! I also have the 7lb and plan on ordering the 15lb soon! I also loved the core dvd that came with this one! =]
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great way of strength training for those that don't like dumbbells.
customer_reviews.text: This kettlebell is great for me due to the contoured base. It sits comfortably on the arm, without putting undue strain on the wrists. I much prefer it to a traditional dumbbell.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Durable Product
customer_reviews.text: Kettlebell is very nice. I bought as a birthday gift for my husband. He loved the contoured backing. It is a great product I am going to buy a lighter one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love the contour shape!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the JM brand kettlebells and they were bruising the top of my wrist on my arms. I decided to try this one, and it is amazing!! I love the shape.. it is a solid piece of metal with the vinyl coating on it which is very nice. It contours my wrist so no more banging them when working out.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great workout
customer_reviews.text: I started off with the 10 lb kettleweight as a beginner and upgraded to this one within a month. Quite a weights AND cardio workout. I really enjoy the 30 minute DVD and don't tire of it.
customer_reviews.author: Colour of Gold

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and decent quality
customer_reviews.text: I had done several days of research and was looking for 3 things: vinyl coating to not damage floor, a larger handle to help w swings, and a good price---which this bell met. So the icing on the cake was the design. I've been using it for 3 weeks and find it very comfortable. My only suggestion is I wish they would've sold a 30lb size. On time delivery too. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: E. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting one of these for a while now. I really like the shape of this one. It curves to fit against my forearms easily. 10 pounds is a good weight for me. the video is also very easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Complete Package
customer_reviews.text: the package arrived super fast, and everything, including the dvd, was packaged inside a tiny cardboard sleeve. And the workout? Perfect...I love Bob Harper, and the kettlebell adds exactly the amount of resistance i need to a really great workout. Definitely a good buy :)
customer_reviews.author: Geek Reanaissance

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Kettlebells
customer_reviews.text: Love the countour. Good quality coating and I continue to grow my set. The contour really helps me stick with snatches.
customer_reviews.author: Amma

customer_reviews.title: I do like the shape of this kettleball
customer_reviews.text: I do like the shape of this kettleball. It definitely seems to lay better on your arm when you are doing certain exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatly reduces wrist bang-ups!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good ergonomic fitness tool. I've since collected several more, and they save my wrist from bruising and they maneuver so nicely. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Kettle Bell. Does not scratch floors. Vinyl coating is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service
customer_reviews.text: Love this! When it arrived, the disc was scuffed from shipping. We emailed GoFit and they immediately sent a replacement at no charge. Gotta love a company that stands by its stuff. Love the product and loved the service we received when things weren't perfect. Yay GoFit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great kettlebell! the shape works great and its very ...
customer_reviews.text: great kettlebell! the shape works great and its very comfortable, it comes with a DVD (I didn't use it) with some exercises
customer_reviews.author: D. Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Nice kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: I liked this kettlebell very much. When I used it into a snatch form, it lands directly to fore arm. I will buy this kind again when I increased my weight.
customer_reviews.author: Vinceley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for beginngers
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my girlfriend who like kettlebell routines, but couldn't help but strike her forearms while doing them. She uses it often.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, the contour shape helps. Easy on the wrist. The vinyl is well done. The product seems to be well made. Overall it is a good product. Meets expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: like the contour
customer_reviews.text: doesn't slam into your forearm when racking the bell compared to the normal kettle bell. I use it for the bob harper kettlebell workouts and it's great
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: The unusual shape makes this bell very useful for a variety of kettle bell exercises. The vinyl covering seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis and Angelika Chappell

customer_reviews.title: GoFit Contoured Vinyl Kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: Like the contour size of this 20 pound kettlebell. Additionally, it arrived before the intended ship date.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Janiec

customer_reviews.title: good kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: I do like the shape, and the grip size, I do recommend. The dvd is for beginners, but no matter what it is a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: pug2884

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would have LOVED it but the metal handle had sharp spots and wasn't smooth
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Wrong DVD
customer_reviews.text: The kettlebell was as described but the DVD is with Brooke Benton not Bob Harper. Weird. I wonder why it was misadvertised?
customer_reviews.author: M. Peebles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this kettlebell. Contoured is the only way to go!
customer_reviews.author: u2u4ea

customer_reviews.title: Love the contoured kettlebell.
customer_reviews.text: My first kettlebell experience and love it. Really like the contoured shape, the 10 lb. size if a good starting weight for beginners. Good intro to kettlebell DVD that comes with it!
customer_reviews.author: nallen

customer_reviews.title: Great transaction!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and smooth transaction. My only complaint is that the company wouldn't ship me any heavier kettle bells. Guam is far away but you would be surprised what people would pay for when they are stuck on a little bitty island. :)
customer_reviews.author: Three Sons and a Little Lady

customer_reviews.title: great bell, video could be better
customer_reviews.text: The bell is great, i use it all the time. I was really hoping that the video would have more options for workouts, but there is really just one series, and it's geared toward teaching, not toward a workout that could be repeated. i'm grateful to have learned the basics, but i guess now im on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H Collins

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product, casing is holding up after 6 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid Product, casing is holding up after 6 months of consistant use. Will look at the GoFit for the additional Kettleball sizes
customer_reviews.author: Teff & Scott & Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for all excercises, if you're planning to do the whole workout on the DVD make sure to stay with a low weight. I purchased a 25lb Kettlebell and it's really, really tough.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Kusek

customer_reviews.title: I am on my second exchange. The blue vinyl ...
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second exchange. The blue vinyl is cracked. I hope the third time is a charm. To be continued! Amazon, please send me a non-defective product. These are very expensive!
customer_reviews.author: YoginiDee

customer_reviews.title: I like this Kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: Very nice; however, It could use a rubber gripper on the handle which would make it more easier to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C

product_meta.title: Contoured Single Vinyl Coated Kettlebell With Training Dvd by GoFit
feature_bullets: COATED TEXTURE FOR EASY, COMFORTABLE GRIPPING: Non-slip grip for complete control. Durable rubberized coating is color-coded by weight and easy on your wood or smooth surfaces

COMFORTABLE KETTLEBELL EXPERIENCE: GoFit's Contour Kettlebells provide a unique, contoured shape that is ergonomically designed to wrap around the wrist and forearm, providing a much more comfortable Kettlebell experience.
IDEAL FOR ANY AGE OR GENDER: The wide range of weights is ideal for anyone wanting to improve fitness
IMPROVE YOUR FORM AND POSTURE: Kettlebell training is a very effective way to help you achieve your goals.
TRAINING DVD INCLUDED: We have a Included a complimentary training DVD with Brook Benton.
